alert.note: Alert for White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 20 at 2:04AM MST until February 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow and very strong winds with reduced visibilities in blowing snow possible. Wind gusts up to 65 MPH will be possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 15 inches possible. * WHERE...White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Very strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
